name: CALG RN
text: We tried the Brown Sugar and the Coconut bubble tea drink that they have, it was really nice even the boba in the drink tastes so good and sweet. I would suggest that you get their regular sugar level rather than the 75%.. the regular ones, taste so much better. But yeah, if you're watching your sweetness levels, then go for the 75%.. the bitter taste of the tea is already somewhat evident in that level.. Masks are still required inside and you wait outside after paying for your order. Prices range around $7. Will definitely visit again.

name: Trupti Shinde
text: Good option for milkshakes lovers and drinks lovers .. they using a very fresh fruit as per our requirements.. I loved it .. ❤️💯

name: EmEmily weirdo
text: We went in today, a poc family coming in for some bubble tea. We entered and was told to put on a mask by girl at the front desk, but she was sitting there on her phone for a few minutes. She seemed rude to us and when more people came in, they weren’t told by other workers since it seemed as if they didn’t care about the mask that was needed since I’m pretty sure they had a sign in front of the store. Overall the drinks weren’t that good and the brown sugar in the drink we ordered dissolved pretty quickly.

name: Dean Slegos
text: A vaccine does not stop the spread. Seems like a great place to work. I should have tipped better

name: VelvetCoatedWonder
text: Everyone who works here is super sweet and do helpful. They're understaffed, but that's not their fault, and everytime I've come my drink tastes amazing and the staff help with modifications to make it exactly the way I want.

name: JennHilda
text: So not shocked by all the one star ratings. Any establishment that is so RUDE they make a child cry on her birthday need to find another line of work outside of the hospitality field. If you want to be treated like garbage feel free to go here.

name: yazzhmine luster
text: To all the negative reviews and the people that like or think these reviews are helpful people never stop and think about how the staff is treated or talked to i go there all the time and i hear almost every time the staff is treated very poorly by the customers they serve i just want to say keep up the amazing work guys will highly recommend

name: Benny Styx
text: Super fast and yummy even though the line was out the door today. Everyone was really nice!

name: Lesley Bates
text: Love this place I travel an hour to get a brown sugar milk tea and my son and my daughter love some of their stuff too I just wish that they had more locations I mean that's really the only cookie tea we have in Alabama to my knowledge if they would have more set up around different areas say one in Gadsden you know some and the south part of Alabama as well. They would make a killing every time I go in there they are packed and lines out the yin yang to get their drinks and then of course people that live around there I think they do grub hub or doordash so they get the opportunity of having the stuff delivered to them where I live we don't have that so I just really wish they would put some spread across Alabama so other people can have the chance of trying those wonderful teas as well

name: Courtlyn Robinson
text: Workers were just sitting on their phones. Also they were out of stock on the tapioca pearls.. the whole reason to get boba tea. It tasted ok but not my favorite place.

name: Elise Collins
text: Rude staff. Google says 6:30pm close but they were sending people away at 6:20pm. Asked them if they could make me a drink since i walked all the way across the mall and she told me she had to go and pick up her kids. Umm okay first of all where is your customer service? Seems like they will hire anyone these days. 4 workers and not 1 would take my order. Definitely going to the better business bureau for this. Girl with glasses was rude and will definitely not be giving $ to this place again. I spoke to another couple and they were sent away too.

name: Long Le
text: Very rude staff don’t waste your money here .

name: Lexi Edwards
text: Awful service and very rude to customers and delivery drivers. They ran out of a bunch of items but were still accepting orders they couldn’t make. The Uber eats lady (who was super amazing) had to deal with them giving her crazy attitude. At the end they made different drinks for the ones I ordered originally but still left out an entire drink. Honestly the experience was so ridiculous and unfair for both the customer and the Uber driver

name: Sab M
text: They have no hours posted at the store and the online hours are inaccurate. Every time I come in they say “we took our last order.” So I ask what time do you close? The employee said “6:30” and I told her that it was only 5:30 and she changed her answer and said “Oh I meant 5:30 then.” The employees are unprofessional and rude. Birmingham needs a new boba shop that is more professional and reasonable to their customers.

name: Megan Williams
text: This place never opens on time. The last few times I’ve gone to the mall specifically for this they have the gate down. When I call they say the won’t open until 1:30. This has happened multiple times. If they are always opening at 1:39, why not update the hours to that so people don’t drive all the way there? I shouldn’t have to call a business to make sure their employees opened on time.

name: Beth C
text: Menu was a little overwhelming but the employees knew it well and had a recommendation for me. I enjoyed it a lot, and hope they can add somewhere to sit while you wait for your drink.

resp.text: We're glad we were able to help! Right now we currently have high tables and are looking into getting chairs.

name: Trevor Norris
text: Nice baristas! Though they're always out of toppings most of the time. I was sad to see that they had taken down the rope above the display where the other art was hanging. My friend had her's up there and we tried to see if they had hung it somewhere else but it was just gone. She also found a gnat in her drink and she did get a new one but on our way out we found another flying around. We haven't been back since and that was almost 2 weeks ago.

name: Ashley S
text: Love this place got dream of butterfly (peach with strawberry topping". My boyfriend got brownsugar. Both was fantastic. They have tons of flavor combos to choose from. Its a fun experience too kiddos love it.

name: Vickie Nguyen
text: Very rude staff instead of ask us what would we like to drink they were on their phone we wait for 10 minute while they on their cell phone.

name: kingkent
text: I would give them 0 stars staff very rude

name: Yajhara Masters
text: Rude. The hours say they open at 12. We waited outside for them to open. The girl in there watched us stand outside until 12:20 before telling us that they wouldn't be opening until 1:30. She could have told us way before or they could have just had the correct time posted.

name: Gwen Davis
text: Not something I am looking to try again. Mediocre tea...

name: Binh Dinh
text: The drink was plain they out of boba and their staff have an nasty attitude

name: Stephanie Froman
text: Always seem to be out of certain bobas and toppings. Ordered 2 drinks with bobas....neither came with it. Very disappointing.

name: Miranda Lawson
text: Extremely rude staff. Waited more than 5 minutes to be spoken to just to be refused service. Turns out the girl (1 of 4) refused us service so she could take her lunch.

name: Rayandra Seville
text: First time here. Waited 30 minutes for one tea! I counted about five workers. Seriously? How in the world can’t they have a better system? Ridiculous!

name: Allen Miller
text: i think today was an off day bc the first two times i came it was quick and delicious. but today i waited 15 mins only for my milk tea to be sent out without milk 🙄

resp.text: Thanks so much Allen!

name: archetypes
text: Usually like this place but I ordered a Purple Love Taro Milk tea today. The store was decently busy so I wanted to get my drink and leave immediately. It wasn’t until I was walking out of the Galleria when I realized there was literally no boba in it. Like really? How do you give me a drink made with boba and not have the boba in it? Will not be going back again.

name: wen
text:
(1):They out of boba often,very disappointed. I drove 20 mins to get boba tea and the result is that you drink milk tea without boba. That happened to me at least 4 times.
(2) : One time, My friend and I went there and we were waiting in front of the counter( we were about 4 feet away). We were waiting on the cashier call next so we can order cuz they seem so busy. And there is a lady show up, cut our line and the cashier looked at us for a second and take that lady’s order. Wow. He know we were here first and just let that lady order without asking us.
(3) : If there is a new boba tea place open in town, I would never come back to here.
Could be the “best” boba tea in town (cuz there only 2 boba tea places)
(4) : In summary, the drink is not bad. Boba always out.

name: Mary Grace Liner
text: First time there today and the staff was so amazing to help me choose for my mother-in-law! Authentic Bubble Tea around BHam!

name: Porsha Wright
text: Today was my second time trying this place...first was several months ago and the service and product were great then. Not the case today. The person who took my order seemed irritated and put off by me asking questions about the different teas and how to order. She was very impersonal and short with me. She walked off from my drink as it was blending and when the blender was done she still wasn’t back. Someone else poured up my tea and served it to me. The drink itself was full of chunks of ice and had very little flavor. Disappointed.

resp.text: Hi porsha! We are deeply sorry for the negative experience you have had today at our store. This is definitely not what we strive for and we hope you give us another try to correct this bad experience.

name: Ron Lauricella
text: They have great boba tea. Was a little upset that the jelly mango was not boba, but that's my fault for not reading it lol

resp.text: Thanks for the review! Sorry i know our menu can be confusing but we are always here to answer questions!

name: Itzy Valdes
text: I don’t like the service , they always close earlier than the time that they say online , I get there and hour before and I was already on line and they didn’t took  my order even i was there with more people an hour before !!

name: Anna Smith
text: One of my favorite places for my me and my friends to get boba tea. Try the coconut milk tea or brown sugar tea with sweet crema!

resp.text: Hi Anna! Thank you so much for you support of our store! We hope to continue to bring you wonderful boba for many times to come!

name: Laura Griffin
text: Excellent peach popping boba! Very cute place

resp.text: Thanks Laura!

name: Baby E.
text: Super rude cashiers, mumbled when asked a question, seemed like they didn’t want to be there, regret leaving a tip just because I was nice, don’t go here🙄

name: Orion Nicely
text: This place was quick, efficient, and some of the best shop tea I have ever had.

resp.text: Thank you so much. Your support means everything to us!

name: Cazz Cake
text:
I'll pass up Starbucks any day just to get their tea instead!
I'm super impressed with the service and quality of the drinks.
The wide range of options to choose from, as well as the customization, gives everyone an opportunity to experiment and find their go-to drink.
Mine is hands down the "Dream of Butterfly," with strawberry bubbles and 50% sweetener.
I definitely recommend giving it a try!

resp.text: We're glad you liked our Dream Of Butterfly. It is a personal favorite due to the aesthetic look of the drink. Thank you for stopping by!

name: weirdfreakofnature
text: I've been waiting for a good boba place for some time! You don't see many of these places around in Alabama. I'm glad this shop opened up, can't wait to come back for more, the original milk tea is the best :]

name: Mai Ngọc Thảo Trần
text: Take too longggggggggg!!!, and brown sugar milk tastes like Winter melon tea.

name: marioandyoshifan34
text: I ordered a Brown Sugar Milk Tea with Almond Milk. When it was finally ready, the girl brought it to me and I was about to drink it. But her coworker asked her to double check and make sure it was the one with Almond Milk. She shrugged her shoulders and just left. I looked at the sticker and it was a normal one. I'm extremely allergic to milk so I'm super glad the cashier said something. The cashier was named Mynhan and her other coworker ended up making it. I wouldn't trust the original one to make me a drink again. I understand mistakes happen but she just shrugged the problem off like it was nothing. I don't know her name but she was short, had brown hair and was on the heavy side. The other two did end up making me another one so I'm super glad they took care of me

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: I really love this place! The people are nice and the tea is great! I go every chance I get and never had a bad experience. KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK!!!!!!

name: Caleb Shirley
text: Definitely the best bubble tea I've had in the area. Not too pricey. Friendly staff and great tea.

name: Cleotilde Wagner
text:
My first visit here wasn’t that pleasant .! The manager at the time her name was Erin and she had the worst attitude I’ve even seen and to top it off she had a foul body odor that met you at the entrance  and seem to be more worried about trying to get us out of there then help us choose a drink.!

Now I believe in second chances so I went back and the new manager is on top of his stuff and friendly .! My drink maker was Erica and she was soo helpful and thanks to her I will be back.!!

name: Anne Lai
text: I have ordered different drinks from this place 4 times and each one was very good! The boba is perfect-not too chewy or mushy and the staff are friendly. Each drink is made to order so you may have to wait a little bit but it is worth it! I prefer this place over Thirstea on Highway 280. This menu isn’t overwhelming and you still have plenty of choices. There is something for everyone here!

name: Cece Princess
text: Good teas

name: Extra Comfy
text: I've been here 4 times and I'm in love! The atmosphere is very pleasant and the employees are super nice. The drinks taste SOOOO good! My favorite drink is the oreo milk tea with coffee jelly (it's super sweet tasting)

name: someone
text: Great place! I get my boba here all the time with my friends.

name: Demon Alexa
text: It was ok

name: Jason Young
text: Was looking forward for this place to open but was very disappointed with my first visit. It took literally more than a half hour to have my oolong milk tea and it even tasted unpleasantly. I understand that they were busy but they really need to work faster.

resp.text: I'm sorry that you had to wait for so long. During that time we were still training and I always tell my employees to not rush too much on drinks because we want to make sure each drink is taken care of. We would love for you to give us another chance.

name: Shetani Mau
text: Knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful staff, especially with people who are not familiar with the flavors or ingredients.

name: goth clown
text: expensive but amazing

name: leftchae
text: Really nice I would recommend Green apple iced blended milky

resp.text: Glad you liked it!

name: Sophia Thomas
text: Friendly staff! Our drinks were ready really quickly :) the tapioca pearls in my drink were a little stale (possibly from sitting out a little too long) but I would definitely go here again!

resp.text: Glad to hear you enjoyed your experience! I'm sorry that our boba wasn't exactly what you expected. We will fix this issue so that you can enjoy 110% of the drink.

name: Arif Patel
text: Best boba in town

name: james webster
text: Finally a real boba place. Very friendly

name: Ali Dele
text: staffs are friendly but always out of brown sugar milk tea

resp.text: We apologize for the wait on brown sugar. Our shipment went missing during transit so we had to order more. We finally got some in! We would love for you to stop by now that we have some!

name: Abdul Diane
text: The teas be bussin

resp.text: Thank you Abdul!

name: Arin Reyna
text: Eh

name: Gladys Morales
text:
(Translated by Google) Supposedly they close at an hour and always close an hour before very bad service

(Original)
Supuestamente cierran a una hora y siempre sierran una hora antes muy mal servicio

name: Timtimtimtim Timtimtim
text:
(Translated by Google) FATHER FATHER

(Original)
BOBABOBABOBABOBABOBABOBA

name: Jeff Gray
text:
Great taste...I give a 5 for the brown sugar tea.

However...

Lower score because "Buy 6 get 1 free" is misleading. I took my family of 6 and bought 6 for $36 but got only one card punch (same as if I bought one on that visit). So if I take my family each time I have to buy 36 to get 1 free....next time we get our own individual cards. Needs fixing.

name: Amy Murphy
text: Tried this place today. The staff was super friendly and welcoming. They were in the process of making more brown sugar bobas, so we got agar bobas instead, which were really good. The Thai milk tea was what I got, and it was delicious. Can’t wait to try the other flavors my next visit!

name: Leo Altenberg II
text: This place is beautiful.  The teas taste wonderful.  The sweet, soft boba pearls have a delightful chew.  The menu photos are an excellent guide.  I can't wait to try another.

name: Bethany Li
text: So excited about this place being open! So many great teas on the menu including the brown sugar boba, Thai boba, jasmine green tea with boba, and the Oreo drink! And if you are not into boba, I recommend the strawberry peach oolong or the Oreo drink! So good.

name: Jiayue Guo
text: So excited to have Tuscaloosa’s first Boba tea store! It’s really good and I enjoyed having drinks here! Everything is worth trying and Oreo Mousse Milk Tea is highly recommended!!!

name: Emily Smith
text: Great boba! Perfect serving size and amount of sweetness. Staff was less friendly than I’d expect, but overall a pretty good experience.

name: Ruby Hoofman
text: I visited BobaMania today for the first time.  I ordered the Brown Sugar Boba Tea.  It is divine!  The flavors are well-balanced, and the boba are the perfect texture.  The serving size is perfect, and the price is right.  Thank you, BobaMania!  Ruby

name: Jingyi Zhou
text: Their Oreo mousse milk tea and strawberry peach oolong tea are really good!! You all should try that! Love this place😍

name: Daniyah Westbrook
text: I haven’t went but I hope my 1st experience is going to be amazing!!!

name: Lindsay Wesson
text: Love their boba! I’m so happy to have a boba place in Tuscaloosa now

name: Kai Cao
text: Best milk tea I ever have! Better than Kung fu tea!

name: Bian Ey
text:
Everyone was very nice and friendly!!
Would highly recommend!

name: Yanqi Zhang
text: Ya’ll need to go here now! I LOVED their fruit teas!

name: Jin Zhao
text: Awesome place!! The boba tea is super good!

name: Gary Rath
text: Awesome drinks!

name: Reed Dye
text: Tiger VR has become a personal favourite for me and my roommate! I absolutely love the place, and their food is amazing for the price. The service is quick, and employees are extremely nice :)

resp.text: Reed! Thank you for take review, it meaning a lot to me. Thank you for choosing us.

name: Yang Hu
text: Delicious Chinese Food. Typically tofu, beef noodle, very tasty.

name: Rachel Griffin
text: The front host was super sweet and kind. I love him and the food. Great customer service and patience.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review

name: Patrick Parish
text: The people and service here are spectacular! Also the food and Milk tea taste great. It’s a great place to get authentic Asian food and one of the only places to get milk tea!

resp.text: thanks bro! Love you

name: J Walters
text: Probably the fastest service I've had at a restaurant locally and the food was on point. Can't tell you about the VR but the set up looks amazing

name: Tandra Smith
text: Their bubble tea is great! Price is awesome too. There’s not many of these places in the area, so glad to have them here. Haven’t had the food, but I’m sure that’s good as well.

name: Harper Rhett
text: Love this place! Amazing food, boba, and service!

resp.text: thank you! Come to see us soon

name: Shekiese Barnes
text: Everything was so good!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Alexander Cardona
text:
Auburn has plenty of great Chinese takeout places, but this one takes the cake. We were going to grab sushi, but I had never seen this new place. While waiting for our orders I had the opportunity to use their VR rig, jaw dropping experience. They now have a lunch menue that comes out to being more food for less than meal at chickfila.
Being walking distance to campus I will definitely be going back

name: Alice Jones
text: The staff is so sweet. The food is delicious. Check this place out!

name: Chu Meen
text: Dope. And always the nicest staff ever. Cool little place, very fun atmosphere

name: Ashleigh Schneider
text: Very nice food and service. Service was absolutely amazing and very polite. I would definitely eat here again. Tasty boba too, would highly recommend the chocolate milk tea and the rose milk tea. :)

resp.text:
thanks for the comment helping us
a lot

name: Thai in Alabama
text:
Glad I found this place. Loved how it was not too sweet. Clean place. Very friendly staff. Will go back and try other stuff on menu

I ordered Chocolate ice with brownies and cashew with condensed milk. Yum!!

name: Mandalorian 345
text: Normally I'm a purest when it comes to certain things, and ice cream is one of them. That was until tonight, the ice cream is shaved like shaved ice, which makes it light and fluffier than normal ice cream. There is several flavors to choose from, like coconut, chocolate, and mango. Then the toppings, holy cow at the toppings from chocolate to fruity pebbles. Then there is a choice of drizzles. You have to try this place at least once.

name: Matt Chaffin
text: So we all got french vanilla! It was wonderful. Very mild sweet and so delicious! Beautiful display and you get a lot of ice cream for the price. The man working the counter was great and explained what everything was! The mochi is super yummy even for a picky eater! The blueberry and strawberry bobas are great too! We topped ours with condensed milk or caramel and all was yummy! Super great atmosphere too! Worth the trip if you're debating getting ice cream here, try it! Especially if you aren't wanting something too heavy!

name: Spencer Stantis
text: Delicious shaved ice cream. The only one I've ever seen in Alabama! The owner makes all the ice cream by hand and is very nice! I would highly recommend this place!

name: Sarena Epstein
text:
Amazing menu and service. The bubble tea, gelato, and macaron ice cream sandwich were delicious. The gelato had real vanilla beans and the tapioca in the bubble tea were just chewy enough.  My family and I love this place.

P.S. The spoons change color

name: Chris Stantis
text: Amazing ice cream in a fun way! Servers are helpful if this is your first time trying out shaved ice cream

name: Janien Fadich Stantis
text: We tried the matcha tea shaved ice cream with mochi and red beans. It was delicious. I will be back to try the fruit flavors soon as well as the bubble tea  The owner was very helpful and friendly.

name: Vikram Gupta
text: I ordered chicken 65 and paneer 65 bowl and the taste is just awesome.

name: Sadie Mae Carlson
text: I always love coming here! I’ve been here even before they started making food. It’s so good, I love how they have so many options where you can even build bowls and wraps too. The customer service is beyond phenomenal and I could honestly eat here everyday. It never gets old! Beyond recommend.

name: arlevia anderson
text: DELISH OMG 🙌🏾😋

name: Keith Walker
text:
O
M
G
This place is incredible! This is family owned and operated.
They are now serving Indian food—bowls, wraps, special dishes—
All made in-house...it tasted soooo good. It felt like the food came right out of their home kitchen.
We met the family—the husband, wife, son...incredibly kind and gracious, and very proud but humble about their delicious made from scratch food.
I’ve had black pepper beef (incredibly tender and flavorful) and tandoori chicken—perfect—and the fries with the sauce.
I highly recommend dining here. I’m trying the ice cream next time!
👏🏻💯‼️

name: Brianna Bowles
text:
Decent Indian food. The tandoori was way to salty. Almost unpalatable. But the chicken 65 was delicious. I like that the food has some spice to it.
Rice was the perfect tenderness. We also got fries for our little one and they were amazing! If it weren't for the tandoori and 30 min wait (only ones there too) I'd give it a 5 star. But to have your main dish too salty to eat was a bummer. Will definitely go back to have the chicken 65 though.

name: East West Martial Arts
text: Delicious Food! Great staff and owners, friendly and helpful. Try something different besides burgers, you won't be disappointed! I highly recommend pairing tandoori chicken with the delicious white garlic sauce! You'll get a creamy delicate spice!

name: Cecilia Venus
text: The best halal food around 👍🏻 my husband and I come here atleast once a week. The owners have become very good friends :) thank you for the excellent quality and hospitality

name: Jose Negron
text: Family run business that has great customer service!! Best hand crafted ice cream in Columbus with fresh ingredients and delicious bubble tea. The food is authentic and prepared fresh daily! I highly recommend this place and look forward to returning again and again!!!

name: Diana Childs
text:
Hidden Surprise! This is a one of a kind Indian/Dessert Palace. Gluten Free Excellency!!! A MUST Try🍧 We had a smoothie with strawberry 🍓/Mango 🥭 Boba beads.

Rolled Ice cream AWESOME

GREAT ATMOSPHERE & SERVICE VERY FRIENDLY!! Will be back 😊

name: Raadia Khan
text: Amazing restaurant ! Halal Indian food, we got the tandoori chicken wrap and masala fries. It had the perfect amount of spice. We then had the masala chai, love you smores ice cream, and the coffee vegan ice cream. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Definitely going to be a regular here. I can’t wait to try all the different menu items

name: John Oliver
text:
My friends and I stumbled upon this place by chance on a day trip to Columbus. At first glance, it’s a quaint, clean, cool little ice cream shop. However, in a quick conversation with the owners, my friends learned that they also offered Indian cuisine and they were offered a free sample. Intrigued, But unable to eat there that day, we all decided to make a special trip to try to the food the following week.

We could not have made a better decision, as this was some of the best food I have ever had. The abundance of flavor was just what I was hoping for and the quality was almost like having a homemade meal served at your table. The owners (it’s a family operated business) checked on us and seemed very genuinely interested in our experience. They were extremely hospitable and friendly, making great conversation and adding to the experience with a very personal touch.

Ice Queen is well worth the time and I’m looking forward to going back!

name: Corey Moore
text: This place is a hidden jem. My wife and I wanted ice cream so we stopped randomly here to find they offer a full authentic Indian menu. We came back this weekend to try their food and it was beyond incredible. Gluten free friendly and vegetarian friendly, which is perfect for my wife and I. We'll travel from Albany for this every chance we get from now on. Could not recommend enough.

name: Daniyal Gaziani
text: Really enjoyed having rolling ice cream here. Probably, the best ice cream I have ever had. The staff is very welcoming and provides good hospitality. I would highly suggest this place.

name: Lucy Clarke
text: Everything there is delicious. I had the tandoori chicken bowl and samosa as my meal, and it was great. Their coconut milk tea was very refreshing, too. The rolled ice cream was excellent, all of the flavors were very good. Everyone working there was super nice and helpful, and they even gave us an extra samosa to apologize for any extra wait time. I would definitely recommend coming here for dessert or dinner (or both).

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review Lucy! We can’t wait to serve you guys again!

name: Radon Vex
text: My wife and I use to come here only for bubba tea. Today, we decided to try their food and it was better than I expected. I got a matcha tea and I hated so the guy made me a Tara tea free of charge. It was absolutely delicious. Ice queen truly deserves 5 stars. The staff is extremely nice the place is always clean. They work quickly and the prices aren’t to bad either. Definitely a hidden gem in Columbus.

name: Amber
text: Been there three times in the past month. I love the boba, especially the brown sugar boba. And I love the honeydew milk tea and the chai milk tea.  The staff was super friendly and helpful. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because when we got the popping boba, a lot of them were already popped so we were just getting the empty boba shells. Besides that, this place is awesome! I definitely recommend going

name: Megan Phillips
text: PHENOMENAL traditional Indian food. Yes, the ice cream is great too, but we drive all the way from Albany for the Indian food. The Chicken 65 is incredible. I can’t have gluten and the owner’s mother is so sweet and guides me on what I can order. We are addicted.

name: Jessie Daniel
text: Great service and yummy food :) respectfully 💕

name: Vivian 'Valkyrie' Piorkowski
text: Our first time and I want to go back. Thankfully it's not far from my house. My sons really enjoyed being able to watch them and they thought it was just amazing how it turned from liquid to ice cream. The variety of ice cream flavors and toppings is great. My husband got a philly cheesesteaks and he said it was really good.

name: Amber
text: Been there three times in the past month. I love the boba, especially the brown sugar boba. And I love the honeydew milk tea and the chai milk tea.  The staff was super friendly and helpful. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because when we got the popping boba, a lot of them were already popped so we were just getting the empty boba shells. Besides that, this place is awesome! I definitely recommend going

name: Megan Phillips
text: PHENOMENAL traditional Indian food. Yes, the ice cream is great too, but we drive all the way from Albany for the Indian food. The Chicken 65 is incredible. I can’t have gluten and the owner’s mother is so sweet and guides me on what I can order. We are addicted.

name: Jessie Daniel
text: Great service and yummy food :) respectfully 💕

name: JoAnna Hill
text: Had a spicy tandoori wrap and fries.  So delicious!!!

name: lydicake yumyum
text: My husband heard about it through a coworker, so we decided to give it a try. When I tell you we weren't disappointed about our trip here. We chose make your own ice cream bowl. It was so delicious, and I love the strawberry pop. The strawberry pop is little squeeshy balls that burst in your mouth, and they are excellent

resp.text: Lydicake! Thank you so much for your review! We are glad we were able to meet your expectations and deliver a great product! We can’t wait to share more exciting items with you soon! PS: Strawberry Pop’s are our absolute favorite too!

name: Daniyal Gaziani
text: Really enjoyed having rolling ice cream here. Probably, the best ice cream I have ever had. The staff is very welcoming and provides good hospitality. I would highly suggest this place.

name: Michael Lynch
text: Novelty way to prepare your ice cream. Watching them prepare your treat is a treat. The post it wall is a great idea.

name: Benjamin Poteat
text: Definitely a nice place to go for dessert, even during quarantine. They wear masks and prepare your treat safely, as always, and are very nice! Definitely recommend to anyone looking to get a tasty treat for a decent price!

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review Benjamin! Yes! Safety of our customers and crew is of the utmost importance to us! We can’t wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Breanna Swain
text: Really Vegan friendly and good food

name: Ben Butler
text: good food ,great fresh ice cream ,great and polite staff

name: Jewel Patterson
text: This is INCREDIBLE food. Go try it, you will NOT be disappointed!!! The ice cream and drinks are also fantastic, but really really go for the food.

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review Jewel! We can’t wait to serve you again! PS: We have added an expanded menu since your last visit 😉 come check out more of delicious items we have to offer!!

name: Titian Dahlvang
text: Great little shop for rolled icecream and Indian food! It's all halal by the way! Great service, and great product. Family run little joint. Best things to get in my opinion are Taro Bubble Tea, Morning Call rolled icecream, and Chicken 65!

resp.text: Thank You for your review Titian! Come see us sometime with Nadia!

name: Zachary Stine
text: Best ice cream in Columbus!  Quite a spectacular process to watch them roll the ice cream on a cold table. Tastes as good as it looks!

name: Angel
text: Well definitely visit again.

name: Luke Miller
text: Delicious Indian food, bubble tea, and rolled Ice cream. They have amazing service and a nice calm atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank You so much Luke. We are so glad you enjoyed your visit! Can’t wait to serve you again soon!

name: A M
text: I have been her twice. I love their bubble tea and the bowls. The food is great and is prepared quickly.

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review AM!

name: Angela Graves
text: Didn’t even know this restaurant was back here. We stopped in to try, what a great find. Food was fresh and delicious, will be back again.

resp.text: Thank You Angela! We can’t wait to see you again!

name: G Bre'Z
text: The ice cream rolls are good and getting to watch them make them is an experience in itself.

name: Ternice Coles
text: Quick service. Very clean

name: Joy Childree
text: Wonderful Ice cream..Great staff.

name: Dalvin Tucker
text: Love the ice cream hope they have many great years at this location, and love the presentation of the funky monkey

name: Vivian 'Valkyrie' Piorkowski
text: Our first time and I want to go back. Thankfully it's not far from my house. My sons really enjoyed being able to watch them and they thought it was just amazing how it turned from liquid to ice cream. The variety of ice cream flavors and toppings is great. My husband got a philly cheesesteaks and he said it was really good.

name: Kaman Yang
text: Delicious rolled ice cream! There are a lot of choices for toppings. Great little dessert place to hang out with family and friends.

name: Mitz Zey
text: Awesome folks and wonderful Indian food.

name: Heather Om
text: Really good rolled ice cream, fun to watch them make it. Awesome flavors, and they have bubble tea. If they had shaved ice Korean style I would be here everyday. We didn't try any of the food, but it looks good too!

name: Alex Bow
text:
As fun to watch being made as it is to eat.
Edit: RIP Royal Cafe, long live Ice Queen.

name: MISS NITA
text: Very delicious ice-cream... I loved it! 🍧

name: mohammed newcombe
text: Quick serving and yummy taste

name: Red2Gaming
text: I dont generally leave reviews unless the place is bad but this place is by far my favorite ice cream place ever I 10/10 recommend here worth the wait time if there is a wait

resp.text: Thank You so much for taking the time to leave us a feedback! We are so glad to be your favorite icecream place! We are trying very hard to rectify the wait times without sacrificing quality or the signature homemade taste that our customers love!

name: Tylor Hall
text: My first time, and didn't disappoint.  I'm a kid at heart, so I got the fruity pebbles.  Staff was very friendly with greeting when entering and exiting.  Highly recommend.

name: Victor Craven
text: This place is 100% 🔥, go in or get their food delivery. The fruit tea is delicious everytime! #IndianFood #BobaTea

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Victor! We strive hard to be 100%🔥 for our customers!

name: erc royals
text:
I have been to 2 other rolled ice cream places and this was bad.  After we ate the ice cream we had a faty oil residue all over the inside of our mouth it was gross.  The workers were very nice.  However they need to wash the curtain to the back room it was very dirty looking.

Updated response to ice queen response:

If you use fresh then you wouldn't have pulled out a container of already crushed up oreos. The other places I've been to places 2 whole oreos on the frozen plate and then pours chocolate or vanilla milk.  Not chocolate syrup!

resp.text: Hello, we are sorry you had a negative experience! Thank you for your feedback! We have corrected the issues highlighted. The fatty residue is because we use fresh cream, milk and Sugar in our icecream base so it gives that rich homemade flavor, please come back and give us a try and we can make it right for you!

name: Stephani Alsop
text: Extremely delicious ice cream 😍 SUPER friendly staff! Love this place

resp.text: Thank You Stephani! We are so glad you enjoyed your first time! We can’t wait to see you again and share our love for good food and icecream with you!

name: Hunter Mitchell
text: Ice cream was good. They should livin the place up a bit though

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review Hunter! Yes we are in the process of renovating the space! We just had a couple of setbacks due to Covid.

name: Jennifer Riedel
text: My first visit under the new ownership and the associate was very sweet and professional. There was an issue with my 15% off coupon and she still honored it! I purchased the s'mores ice cream and my father purchased the mango green tea. She was very quick and courteous. The establishment was clean, very nice music playing, and the vibe was chill.

name: cupcake toturial
text: I did not like my drink, and it expensive !

resp.text: We are sorry for your experience Cupcake! Come back and see us to give us a chance to make it right! Please ask for the manager when you come in!

name: James Galbraith
text: Good product, but extremely long wait time after placing order

resp.text: Hello James, we are extremely sorry that you had to wait a long time after placing your order, we always prioritize our service speed and are extremely sorry that we weren’t able to deliver on it, after speaking with the team it was brought to our attention that we were short staffed due to two employees calling out and that contributed to a long wait time when you visited, the staff shortage was resolved soon thereafter when other employees were called in. Please do come back and give us a try again and please accept this coupon for a free order of rolled icecream on us. Just show this response and your ID to the manager or shift leader and we will take care of you! See you soon!

name: Carliese Inman
text: Very good ice cream and friendly staff. Will be returning.

name: Emily B
text: The ice cream is so fun to watch being made. It looks pretty and tastes pretty good too. The kids loooooove going to get ice cream at the Ice Queen. We go often.

name: Brittany Bailey
text: I went with my parents last week. They provided awesome service, and were very willing to answer a million questions. The ice cream is made right in front of your eyes from a fresh custard mix! It's a lot like having sushi made in front of you. They add the flavorings and the chopped up candy/fruit/etc right there as they freeze and form the liquid ice cream on a frozen surface. (See my video) They also make a nitrogen frozen ice cream on the spot too. I didn't try that, but there were lots of kids around who really seemed you be enjoying it. Highly recommended. Great for sharing, since you get several rolls. Toppings are included with no extra charge.

name: SIMPLYBABY G
text: It was delicious made my own strawberry ice cream, toppings: strawberries, pecans, and cupcake bites (balls) and a strawberry sauce 😍💖

name: Fredek Leiningen
text: Great food. Great prices. My buddy got this fajita dish that was ridiculous. Full of shrimp and steak that came out sizzling. Atmosphere was ok. Not much ambiance. That said the food... Wow. Close to Elgin CC too!

name: Chloe Nam
text: This was first time been there and it was so different...and taste was good...♥

name: Breanna Garza
text: I don’t know why Royal Cafe closed down, but I sure wish it hadn’t. It was my favorite place in Columbus to go for ice cream! Went into Ice Queen shortly after they opened....I didn’t even get anything because they changed the menu up SO much!! Now everything that was good is gone. R.I.P. Royal Cafe

name: Johnny Adams
text:
Took my daughter to go try this place and wow were we surprised.
Amazing ice cream. I will definitely be back.

name: Hispoet Johnson
text: The service was great the process is so cool the tapioca was ohhh so sweet but mercy so was the ice cream lol I think I got the wrong flavor. I love taro because its not so sweet but that one tasted like a sugar shack! Lol but I tell you it's the absolute creamiest ice cream I've ever had! Great place

name: J
text: This place is really great. Simple formula, but they make the ice creams so well. Staff was very nice as well. We are def coming again.

name: Jahmali Samuel
text: This was my first visit, went with the family.  We had the rolled ice cream.  It was very good! Lots of flavor combinations to choose from. It's prepared right in front of you, fun to watch.  Definitely will be returning in the near future.

name: Mercedes Ryles
text: Her food is really good the ice cream is good. I've had alot of my order wrong due to language barrier. I honestly think the shop would have more business if she worked on that too. The chicken teriyaki with fried rice and vegetables is a hit...her chicken philly's are great too..

resp.text: Hello Mercedes, we believe this review was meant for the previous owner, we do not serve the dishes you mention in your review, we have completely overhauled our menu after taking over in March 2020, we welcome you to give us a try and check out our new menu! We sure hope we can earn a five star rating from you! See you soon!

name: Hispoet Johnson
text: The service was great the process is so cool the tapioca was ohhh so sweet but mercy so was the ice cream lol I think I got the wrong flavor. I love taro because its not so sweet but that one tasted like a sugar shack! Lol but I tell you it's the absolute creamiest ice cream I've ever had! Great place

name: Jahmali Samuel
text: This was my first visit, went with the family.  We had the rolled ice cream.  It was very good! Lots of flavor combinations to choose from. It's prepared right in front of you, fun to watch.  Definitely will be returning in the near future.

name: J
text: This place is really great. Simple formula, but they make the ice creams so well. Staff was very nice as well. We are def coming again.

name: Mercedes Ryles
text: Her food is really good the ice cream is good. I've had alot of my order wrong due to language barrier. I honestly think the shop would have more business if she worked on that too. The chicken teriyaki with fried rice and vegetables is a hit...her chicken philly's are great too..

resp.text: Hello Mercedes, we believe this review was meant for the previous owner, we do not serve the dishes you mention in your review, we have completely overhauled our menu after taking over in March 2020, we welcome you to give us a try and check out our new menu! We sure hope we can earn a five star rating from you! See you soon!

name: Atif Iqbal
text:
Amazing ice cream. Had this type in California long ago but the flavor here was amazing. Ambience was great. They have a patio that’s so relaxing . I will be there again . Try their Thai tea .

I had all this after their Italian Philly for lunch .

name: pam saltsman
text: Best experience I have ever had with ice cream. Wish there was a place like this in Indiana!

name: Raudell M
text: Great taste good quick service also you can watch them make your 🍦 icecream its cool

name: Tianna Storey
text: I always saw places like this on YouTube and always wanted to go and now there's this place in Columbus that does the rolled ice cream is amazing. I'm going to have a task where I try every single kind and combination that they serve. Everything from green tea,mango and coffee.

name: Lacy Harden
text: This place has an identity crisis . It's called a cafe and deli but it's actually an ice cream shop . We had no idea until we arrived. The other customers seemed to be enjoying the ice cream but can you really screw up ice cream? The deli part is about 10 items mostly variations of a cheese steak. I asked about the ingredients and the guy obviously didn't know and as another employee walked up, he simply walked off without answering. I asked her the same question and she didn't know either. I mean seriously?!? Overall the service was completely lacking! Obviously no training had been performed. With all that said, the food was actually great once it arrived. I had to go back to ask for ketchup and they had forgotten the coffee purchased. The place also lacked any cleanliness standards for an eatery and there was no place to store the tray from the food.

name: Crystal Ramsey
text: My kids nice new ice cream spot

name: Jamie Gregory
text: Excellent ice cream rolls and good customer service.  We will definitely be returning

name: Sumgirluknow
text: Yummy ice cream and food! I got the green tea rolled ice cream & loved it! Their chicken sandwiches are simple yet tasty as well.

name: Trish D
text: It's fun to watch them roll the ice cream on the slab. Their fries are good, too. Tuesday is military discount day!

name: brianna guidry
text: Fantastic place. Love the ice cream and the show they let us watch them make the ice cream.

name: Moises
text: This young boy that wear glasses did an amazing job! OUTSTANDING ICE CREAM!!!! That young boy was so kind. I think his name was Maximus? But if that’s not it he wears a cap and glasses he’s a good worker!! So kind!

name: Kim “KW” Williams
text: Daughter received a gift card from Royal in September, 2018 for her birthday. Tried to use it today, January, 2019 and was told they could not accept it because of the company name change 😠. Made my daughter cry and wasted my friend"s money. So now that's $10 free in their pocket. Very bad business practice in my opinion. Didn't even try to work with us or apologize.  Do not buy any gift cards from this place. They def will not receive my business.

name: simply chaynee
text: Good ice cream and not that bad when it comes to price.good service

name: Alrendria Blaze
text: Very good, love the rolled ice cream and good service

name: Terran Nichols
text: Absolutely amazing!

name: Sabrenia West
text: My first time but definitely not my last!

name: Alrendria Blaze
text: Very good, love the rolled ice cream and good service

name: simply chaynee
text: Good ice cream and not that bad when it comes to price.good service

name: Jed Mangal
text: Enjoyable bubble tea,  excited to try rolled ice cream

name: Sabrenia West
text: My first time but definitely not my last!

name: Daniel Hall, Jr.
text: Now this was really great. They make your icecream while you're looking. Wow

name: Daron Allen
text: If you want to try something new and fun, this is it. Good first date place.

name: Ryan Janeway
text: Needs serious decor work. They should've finished decorating and rounding out those rough edges before opening.

name: Codie Bell
text: Overall great customer service; it only takes a few minutes to be served after completion of ordering from the menu. The staff is very polite and knowledgeable with any questions you may have on their menu.

name: Lynette Teall
text: First time trying rolled ice cream and I loved it. I mean it’s hard to get ice cream wrong. Takes a while especially if there’s already a line but worth the wait.

name: Ashley Dailey
text: The first time I tried Ice Queen was in Lagrange,GA and let me say it was amazing. Being a lover of bubble tea and working for a bubble tea store at one point I was so excited to learn that there was an Ice Queen in Columbus,GA as well! I’ve been there multiple times and while the tea/tapioca pearls are a hit or miss I still go because I like that they don’t use powdered Thai tea, to my knowledge anyways. I also enjoy one girl who seems to always work there and is very friendly and nice( I don’t know her name but she is short and always has hoop earings). I recently went there with my friend (a HOUR and about ten minutes before they closed) and ordered our typical drinks with the tapioca pearls and was told that they didn’t have any. Disappointed because that is one of the biggest reasons for a BUBBLE tea, they did offer strawberry and mango popping boba (which aren’t our favorites due to it being a Thai tea and my friend doesn’t enjoy them at all) and I nicely told them never mind. The girl that was working gave me a really rude/nasty look that almost makes me not want to come back because of it.( this same girl has helped me my first time coming to this location and her friend was behind me and she was very, VERY distracted by that). Besides those things most of my visits here have been pleasant.

name: Lynette Teall
text: First time trying rolled ice cream and I loved it. I mean it’s hard to get ice cream wrong. Takes a while especially if there’s already a line but worth the wait.

name: Steven Miller
text: I got a fruit slush and it was extremely sweet I ended up throwing in out

name: Codie Bell
text: Overall great customer service; it only takes a few minutes to be served after completion of ordering from the menu. The staff is very polite and knowledgeable with any questions you may have on their menu.

name: Daron Allen
text: If you want to try something new and fun, this is it. Good first date place.

name: Catherine Stanton-Schmoll
text: The ice cream was really good.  Staff nice.  Never had rolled ice cream until today and it was a real treat.  Will be going there again.

name: jeanne Adam
text: We Arrived at 11:30 and placed our order. The last two people were served at 1:00 there were 16 of us.  They gave out of French fries after about 6 of of our orders and we were served chips.  There was no ice for the drinks,  we saw several to go orders leave before we were served. The buns were cold.  The servers were nice but not efficient.

name: Mike Harmon
text: What a joke this place is... don't think it will last to much longer

name: JEREMY Baxley
text: Really good froyo.

name: Desiree Spezialy
text: Great fries and Philly, love the Italian! Drinks were nice and I love how they lid them!

name: Cari Best
text: Delicious ice cream roll ups!  The only thing I would change would be for them to advertise outside and inside on the walls that roll up ice cream is what they do/serve!  We had no idea that’s what it was bc there aren’t any pictures of it anywhere to see and the dominant menu on the wall is for slushes and milk slushes - it doesn’t say “create your own ice cream ROLL UPS” which would make a huge difference bc it’s super fun to watch and delicious to eat. Can’t wait to come back.

name: Marco Polo
text: Decided to try out the place, and I did enjoy the ice cream and the way that it was prepared. The only minor complaint I have is that the menus could use a little bit more detail, but overall five stars from me

name: C.C.
text: Placed first order through waitr..OMG..new york hotdog?..How dare you even use the name. And it was suppose to come with fries..didnt happen. The spicy subs were so so..i guess its the ice cream..not the food.

name: Robin Hobbs
text: Really enjoyable experience. The ice cream was really good. I also really enjoyed watching them create the rolled icecream

name: Adeel Chaudhry
text:
Was back in Columbus for the weekend, asked a random local for a recommendation for a good place to get some desserts . Was told about you guys and the unique way you serve ice cream .Had to suppress my guffaw because i had already been to your place during my last visit , and enjoyed my experience !
Keep it up guys , you are getting famous !
😊🤘👍

name: Ashley Burkett
text: The ice cream was really good. Would of liked to had interaction w the staff they had their own convo. Between one another. Took awhile for the wait. Overall good ice cream

name: Maximus Raniero
text: I tried the original and the Italian Phillies, and they were so good! The customer service was excellent and it was very clean!

name: Abdul Basit
text: Unbelievable food . This is a place which caters to everyone . Recommend  the Philly meat on a platter you have to ask for it they will give it on bed of seasoned fries .  Ice cream is out of this world .They roll it and my cousons enjoyed it . Excellent customer service .

name: Gua Pa
text: Customer service here is A+. We've found a new place for great ice cream 🙂🍦🍧🍨.

name: Victoria Rosado-Cohen
text: The ice cream was decent but I expected more for what it was worth. It kinda had a frost bite taste which makes sense considering they rapidly freeze it. Glad I tried it though!

name: Carla Alvarez
text:
It's the little things...
I just left this place with my ice cream, wich I was really looking forward to since everyone has had nothing but good things to say about. The service was nice and quick and the ice cream tasted really good, HOWEVER, as I separated the rolls I noticed the one thing that will make me not want to come back (and the reason for the one star, A HAIR.
This is DISGUSTING!!!
The young man that was doing my ice cream was wearing a cap and wearing gloves, and his hair was blonde not black. Clearly it wasn't his hair. It makes me wonder what else you could find.
It sucks, because this really ruined it for me.

name: Chami Storey
text: Great phillys, yummy rolled ice cream, and great bubble tea. Nice staff and always a great atmosphere.

name: Rave HZ
text: My fiance and I ordered through waitr as we had never tried this place before and wanted to see if it was good due to the reviews. Well I ordered an Italian sub sandwich and it was really greasy and it looked smaller than the picture on Waitr. The fries....they were okay but they were soggy and not at all crispy. It tasted like someone cooked them and then figured it wasn't worth the extra 5 minutes and said it was done. The grilled cheese wasn't even brown and the chicken was a little dry but I think that's Waitrs fault since I'm sure it was juicier when made. The only good thing honestly was the ice cream. I'm just really concerned about the quality of the food and dont know if I'll ever order from Waitr again.

name: Rizwan Khan
text: Great place for the whole family! Awesome ice cream and good ambience . Highly recommended

name: DeBron
text: Delicious, fast service. Watching the ice cream be made was a treat itself.

name: stephen coates
text: "Cool" twist on build your own ice cream sundae.  Rolled icecream!

name: Lavanya Vuligonda
text: I am a person who really enjoys bubble tea/smoothie specially me being from cali. I am a regular customer, Icecream here is really good but i have to give a 2 due to service, i always ask for extra tapioca for smoothie and i am ready to pay few extra bucks. I dont understand why they do this all the time they dont put extra tapioca specially few staff people in the evenings. I am really disappointed as today even though the guy keeps on telling the other girl to put extra tapioca she did not. I wish there is other bubble tea place in columbus.

name: CJ
text:
Great place to go locally and sit back and enjoy your family and friends with a cool treat!
So many options to choose from and the service was excellent!

name: salman shehryar
text: Wonderful place. Nice atmosphere. I really enjoyed my time there with family.

name: Raina Alexis
text: I've never had rolled ice cream before it was a good experience.

name: Shelia McIntyre
text: My son really wanted to experience the rolled ice cream so I took him here and he enjoyed it but it was a bit pricey and the staff could have been a little more engaged with the customers. Other than the price and customer service it was ok.

name: F32 STEVEN
text: Ordered a Thai tea and it comes out as thick tea. The Bubble tea isn’t good here.

name: Adele D'Eon
text: Tasty ice cream for a reasonable price. Hot tip: Green tea ice cream goes really well with nutella mixed in!

name: Flint Meycall
text: Unbeleavle ice cream very fresh not like marblestone or dairy queen . Will come back regularly.  Thanks

name: Lauren Gray Baby
text: They had mango ice cream and that's really all that matters to me. 🤣

name: Ashfaque Malek
text: Great place for roll-up ice cream..!!

name: JMSA460
text:
Wait time is super long.

Not that clean when handling food. They have tonsils to get the oreos out of the jars but they use their hands with gloves on.

Note: just because you have gloves on doesnt mean your gloves arent clean.

I saw the same individual open the door to outside several times also handle food improperly.

Mikalea did check on us and asked us how long we have been waiting; thank you, ma'am.

name: Lisa Santa
text: Good service awesome icecream..

name: Jacee
text: Kind people, always ready to help, answering any questions and of the employee can not answer they quickly find or call some one who can.

name: Quinn Bent
text: Just go...super yummy

name: Andrea Brown
text: It wasn't sweet enough for me. Also they are slim on the toppings for it to cost almost 7.00

name: CrazyTown On The Spectrum
text: Fun place! Great ice cream

name: Thomas Cook
text: Really cool to see the rolled ice cream and taste great as well

name: Shalon Chester
text: Delicious homemade rolled ice cream and nice spot to enjoy with the family

name: Milton Watts
text: Great place to get an ice cream!

name: Raymond Nichols
text: Soooo good

name: Abby Miley
text: This place was delicious I loved the rolled icecream 🍦 and I totally RECOMMEND !!!! 💖

name: donald williams
text: Great place to eat. Love their Philly .

name: Scherita Unique
text: My icecream tasted terrible.

name: Mohammad Imtiaz
text: Great food and concept . Enjoyed their Philly sandwich as well.

name: Mandy Tarvin
text: Great customer service, fresh toppings and an experience you have to try!!

name: Mohammed Piracha
text: Hi AWOSOM service and excellent food.

name: Philbert Witherspoon
text: Great Ice Cream

resp.text: Thank You for your kind review Philbert!

name: Gregory Cotto
text: Came in for a Philly recently and it was awesome!! Will be back!

name: Angela Moss
text: Staff is quick and make great rolled icecream!

name: James Stacy Vann
text: Very good ice cream rolls, excellent staff, cool atmosphere.

name: Willie Oglesby
text: Great people, great service, and great ice cream!!! Will definitely be back!!!

name: Faiza Uzair
text: Best bubble teas in town

name: Callie W
text: Fun place, good food, and great service! :)

name: April Smithwick
text: The ice cream was delicious.

name: Zack Saleem
text: Better than any other ice cream I have ever had .

name: Mike Davenport
text: Not impressed. The ice cream was bland and hardly with the wait.

name: Amiri Sonie
text: Ice cream was delicious!

name: xavier williams
text: Great Ice Cream

name: Jynean Wolf
text: Best ice cream around

name: Leslie Lanning
text: Fun to watch, and delicious!

name: Kathy Storey
text: Delicious rolled ice cream!

name: Mark Snider
text: Had to get a refund because they didn't have enough people to fix our order.

name: Ehsan Iqbal
text: Delicious ice cream . Great wings as well .

name: Jonathan Offthat
text: Nothing bad here

name: Stephanie S
text: Staff is kind product not enough flavor and it cost way too much for that little bitty old Bowl

name: Tremaine Winston
text: Great atmosphere and attitude.

name: Against Odds
text: So amazing

name: Linda Miller
text: My grandchildren love it

name: Mike Jones
text: Great experience

name: NADEEM CHAUDHRY
text: Amazing ice cream rich flavor ...

name: Shay Norman
text: Delicious rolled ice cream!

name: Jason Buice
text: Great rolled ice-cream

name: Mateo Castillo
text: Quick and yummy

name: Sohaib Lodhi
text: Worst service

name: ReJeana Ugh
text: Yummy ice cream rolls

name: Nene Anderson
text: Awesome

name: Jacob Brown
text: Delicious

name: TheRealGeoDash (Travis Silva)
text: Amazing

name: Brittany Prophet
text: Super good!

name: Dee Dee Smith
text: Good

name: Brittni Shuttleworth
text: So good

name: Zuhair Hasan
text: Great place, amazing dessert

name: Amal Jan
text: Great ice cream!

name: SHERMAN SCOTT
text: Best ice cream love the coffee

name: Wanda Chapman
text: Friendly staff

name: Farrukh Khan
text: Excellent

name: KYLAH’S Cooking show
text: So awesome

name: Avery
text: Best place i have ever been!!!!!!

name: Brittany Adams
text: It was alright nothing special

name: Linda White
text: I'd rather have scooped ice cream.

name: DIANNA MOORE
text: This place is great

name: Michelle Carlisle
text: Great icecream, good prices,  and good vibes!

name: Tracy Daniel
text: Amazing combinations of rolled ice cream
